selectedVerses.text: at the head of the noisy streets she cries out; at the entrance of the city gates she speaks:
Call the name of Pharaoh, king of Egypt, 'Noisy one who lets the hour go by.'
I will surely assemble all of you, O Jacob; I will gather the remnant of Israel; I will set them together like sheep in a fold, like a flock in its pasture, a noisy multitude of men.
If I speak in the tongues of men and of angels, but have not love, I am a noisy gong or a clanging cymbal.
